instructions: Place chicken in large shallow dish.
Add ketchup, honey, soy sauce, lemon juice, and vegetable oil, along with pepper, chili sauce, and salt.
Cover the dish and let it stand for about 1 hour in the refrigerator.
Prepare the grill, then grill to desired doneness.
title: Honey BBQ-Marinated Chicken Drumsticks
steps: Place chicken in large shallow dish. Add ketchup, honey, soy sauce, lemon juice, and vegetable oil, along with pepper, chili sauce, and salt. Cover the dish and let it stand for about 1 hour in the refrigerator. Prepare the grill, then grill to desired doneness.
